</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array with all registered task types for the given agent. The values are the names set in <tt>CfgTasks</tt> classes <tt>name</tt> property. The same names are used for [[unregisterTask]] </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''registeredTasks''' teamMember </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> teamMember: [[Team Member]] - [[teamMember]] [[agent]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>[[Array]] of [[String]]s - names of tasks </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>tasklist = [[registeredTasks]] [[teamMember]] _agent;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_rabbit = [[createAgent]] ["Rabbit_F", [[position]] [[player]],[], 0, "None"];

Hint shows <tt>["Animal Main Task"]</tt> in Arma 3.</value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
